tosdr.tldr: DuckDuckGo doesn't send your searches to other sites. No personal information is saved. No cookies are used by default, but cookies can be saved on your computer for some features (e.g. settings). They save searches but only in a way that does not personally identify you (no storing of your IP address for example.) DuckDuckGo uses aggregated, non-personal search data to improve things like misspellings.
